catalog-description:
Wikidata is a free linked database that can be read and edited by both humans and machines. 
Wikidata acts as central storage for the structured data of its Wikimedia sister projects including Wikipedia, Wikivoyage, Wikisource, and others.
dataset-live-description: The live version of the data, includes entities and properties.
dataset-dump-description: A static JSON dump for the given date
distribution-ld-description: The Linked Data endpoint. Format is resolved through content negotiation.
distribution-api-description: The MediaWiki API endpoint. Format is given through the "format" parameter. Only non-depricated formats are listed.
